heading: Akkhanâ€™s Grasp Dungeon Guide
content: Akkhan's Grasp does not contain any dangerous monsters, but has a convoluted layout that requires a great deal of backtracking. It is solid for farming, and is currently a possible . The Blood Bishop is easy to defeat, with only one annoying attack where he tries to stun you by grabbing you. You can easily dodge this attack with Evade or another mobility Skill just before it happens. This dungeon unlocks the , a powerful offensive aspect for a Necromancer. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
